name: Tree Tower Defence
description:
An attempt at the tower defence genre with a tree theme. Perhaps a bit too ambitious of a project for me at this point, however a significant amount of time was lost on fixing a rather silly bug so otherwise I would have been much closer to completing the core mechanics. I know it's not much but please feel free to share any feedback.

Controls:

WASD: camera movement

Mouse click: the white squares are tower bases
